reviews.review_title: The Billionaire That Does Not Last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is good while it works. It is easy to use; you press on the bottom to change the settings. The charging is easy. However, it only lasted me six months. Out of nowhere it just stopped holding charge.
